item.title: Making Spark Jobs Faster and Error Free
item.description: Following are a some thoughts I have jotted down to help write Spark jobs that are faster and less prone to issues like Out of Memory errors - Understand your data Get a good understanding about your data before you set about writing any set of transformations and actions on it. By understanding your data, I mean the following - What is the size of your data? Is there any skew in your data?
